languages.text: "Я не стану оспаривать суждения префекта, но..." {n}Соломон пристально смотрит вам в глаза.{/n} "Вам надо было принять решение по непростому вопросу, и вы это сделали. Взяли ответственность на себя. Я ценю в людях подобные качества".

"I am not going to call the prefect's judgement into question, but..." {n}Solomorne peers at you.{/n} "You had to make a difficult decision, and you made it. You took responsibility. I appreciate such qualities in people."
languages.original_text: "Я не стану оспаривать суждения префекта, но..." {n}Соломон пристально смотрит вам в глаза.{/n} "Вам надо было принять решение по непростому вопросу, и вы это сделали. Взяли ответственность на себя. Я ценю в людях подобные качества".

"I am not going to call the prefect's judgement into question, but..." {n}Solomorne peers at you.{/n} "You had to make a difficult decision, and you made it. You took responsibility. I appreciate such qualities in people."

languages.text: 「総監の判断に異を唱えるつもりはありませんが…」{n}ソロモーンはあなたをじっと見つめた。{/n}「あなたは難しい決断を迫られ、やり遂げました。責任を引き受けたんです。私はそういう人間性を評価します」
languages.original_text: "I am not going to call the prefect's judgement into question, but..." {n}Solomorne peers at you.{/n} "You had to make a difficult decision, and you made it. You took responsibility. I appreciate such qualities in people."

traits.locale_text: 「総監の判断に異を唱えるつもりはありませんが…」{n}ソロモーンはあなたをじっと見つめた。{/n}「あなたは難しい決断を迫られ、やり遂げました。責任を引き受けたんです。私はそういう人間性を評価します」

languages.text: "Ich werde das Urteil der Präfektin nicht infrage stellen, aber ..." {n}Solomorne fixiert dich.{/n} "Ihr musstet eine schwierige Entscheidung treffen, und das habt Ihr getan. Ihr habt Verantwortung übernommen. Ich schätze solche Qualitäten bei Menschen."
languages.original_text: "I am not going to call the prefect's judgement into question, but..." {n}Solomorne peers at you.{/n} "You had to make a difficult decision, and you made it. You took responsibility. I appreciate such qualities in people."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde das Urteil der Präfektin nicht infrage stellen, aber ..." {n}Solomorne fixiert dich.{/n} "Ihr musstet eine schwierige Entscheidung treffen, und das habt Ihr getan. Ihr habt Verantwortung übernommen. Ich schätze solche Qualitäten bei Menschen."

languages.text: « Je ne cherche pas à remettre en question le jugement de la préfète, mais... {n}Solomorne vous lance un regard scrutateur avant de reprendre.{/n} Vous deviez prendre une décision difficile et vous avez tranché. Vous avez assumé vos responsabilités. C'est une qualité que j'apprécie particulièrement. »
languages.original_text: "I am not going to call the prefect's judgement into question, but..." {n}Solomorne peers at you.{/n} "You had to make a difficult decision, and you made it. You took responsibility. I appreciate such qualities in people."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne cherche pas à remettre en question le jugement de la préfète, mais... {n}Solomorne vous lance un regard scrutateur avant de reprendre.{/n} Vous deviez prendre une décision difficile et vous avez tranché. Vous avez assumé vos responsabilités. C'est une qualité que j'apprécie particulièrement. »

languages.text: «No seré yo quien ponga en tela de juicio el dictamen de la prefecta, pero...». {n}Solomorne te observa detenidamente.{/n} «Tuvo que tomar una decisión difícil, y lo hizo. Asumió la responsabilidad. Valoro esa cualidad en una persona».
languages.original_text: "I am not going to call the prefect's judgement into question, but..." {n}Solomorne peers at you.{/n} "You had to make a difficult decision, and you made it. You took responsibility. I appreciate such qualities in people."

traits.locale_text: «No seré yo quien ponga en tela de juicio el dictamen de la prefecta, pero...». {n}Solomorne te observa detenidamente.{/n} «Tuvo que tomar una decisión difícil, y lo hizo. Asumió la responsabilidad. Valoro esa cualidad en una persona».

languages.text: “我不打算质疑行政官的判断，不过……”{n}索罗蒙凝视着你。{/n}“你不得不做出艰难的决定，而你做到了，你承担了责任。我欣赏这样的品质。”
languages.original_text: "I am not going to call the prefect's judgement into question, but..." {n}Solomorne peers at you.{/n} "You had to make a difficult decision, and you made it. You took responsibility. I appreciate such qualities in people."

traits.locale_text: “我不打算质疑行政官的判断，不过……”{n}索罗蒙凝视着你。{/n}“你不得不做出艰难的决定，而你做到了，你承担了责任。我欣赏这样的品质。”

languages.text: "Prefektin yargısını sorgulamak bana düşmez ama..." {n}Solomorne sana bakıyor.{/n} "Zor bir karar vermeniz gerekiyordu ve bu kararı verdiniz. Sorumluluk aldınız. İnsanlarda bu tür nitelikler takdire şayandır."
languages.original_text: "I am not going to call the prefect's judgement into question, but..." {n}Solomorne peers at you.{/n} "You had to make a difficult decision, and you made it. You took responsibility. I appreciate such qualities in people."

traits.locale_text: "Prefekt'in yargısını sorgulamak bana düşmez ama..." {n}Solomorne sana bakıyor.{/n} "Zor bir karar vermeniz gerekiyordu ve bu kararı verdiniz. Sorumluluk aldınız. İnsanlarda bu tür nitelikler takdire şayandır."

languages.original_text: "I am not going to call the prefect's judgement into question, but..." {n}Solomorne peers at you.{/n} "You had to make a difficult decision, and you made it. You took responsibility. I appreciate such qualities in people."
